column1: Little Goat Diner////Food was good. At least there's that. I had the Pork Belly Pancake on a scallion pancake. Delicious and sweet meat. My sister had today's special
column2: the Fish Tostadas. Huge portion and perfectly fried fish. We shared the fried pickles: flavorful batter
column3: very crispy and lightly battered. I also had the Goat Chili
column4: which was spicy and oh so good! We also had a cinnamon roll brought out
column5: which one of the kids exclaimed they "loved
